description: Try our easy to follow Watermelon, Strawberry & Kiwifruit Popsicles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Strawberry,Halal,Low kilojoule,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Watermelon,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Watermelon, Strawberry & Kiwifruit Popsicles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut watermelon into 1cm pieces. Transfer to a food processor with strawberries and pulse until smooth.
Pass watermelon mixture through a sieve to remove strawberry seeds. Pour into popsicle moulds, filling 3/4 of the way up. Freeze for 2 hours until almost frozen.
Meanwhile, place kiwifruit in food processor and pulse until smooth.
Remove popsicles from freezer. Pour kiwifruit pur√©e into popsicle moulds to fill to the top. Insert popsicle sticks into the centre of each.
Freeze for a further 4 hours or until completely frozen.
